forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfurls under a clear blue sky, the sun casting a gentle glow that seems to welcome all who venture outside. As temperatures hover near a comfortable 65 degrees, a subtle shift in the afternoon beckons a dip to around 63, reminding residents that even the warmest days carry a hint of the city’s characteristic changeability. The breeze, a soft northwest whisper at 5 to 10 mph, carries the faint smells of the ocean, mingling with the comforting scent of freshly brewed coffee wafting from nearby cafés.

While the sun-drenched streets invite you to stroll, the low early evening temperatures, dropping to around 51, suggest a few layers might be wise for your twilight, post-sunset escapades. Perhaps a light jacket is in order as you sip on a warm drink and watch the bustling city, now illuminated by twinkling lights. With the clarity of the day, the Golden Gate Bridge stands proudly, a striking silhouette against the horizon, inviting those who appreciate both its grandeur and the relaxed charm of the city to visit. Whether you choose to explore outdoor street markets or settle into a cozy spot with a book, today is undeniably pleasant—perfect for savoring the simple joys that San Francisco offers.
